description: Dino`s Darumaka was revealed in the third round of the Don George Battle Tournament in Raimon Town. Dino`s Darumaka battled against Ash`s Palpitoad and was defeated which eliminated Dino from the tournament. None of its moves were shown as the battle wasn`t covered in the episode for more than a few seconds.
name: Darumakka (Dino)
